<!-- Weather -->

|vo_04_02_title      = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = I had a big lunch. Lots of meat. Mm, I'm happy.
|vo_04_03_title      = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = Go to sleep. I watch the moon.
|vo_04_04_title      = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = You sleep now. I keep watch.

|vo_05_01_title      = About {name}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = I have no human family. I am a wolf.

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Friends
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Friends.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = You are my friend. We can hunt. Together!
|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: Weapons
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Weapons.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = I have iron claws and teeth of thunder. I protect you.

|vo_07_01_title      = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = Vision helps Razor... fight with lightning tooth! Protect Lupical!
|vo_07_02_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = I like the stars at night. So many stars. In the sky, in the lake. And in the city.
|vo_07_03_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = The wolves are my Lupical. My family.

|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_quest      = The Meaning of Lupical
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = Lisa lightning makes the sky black. She is strong. She is scary.
|vo_08_01_mention    = Lisa

|vo_08_02_friendship = 4

|vo_08_02_mention    = Barbara

|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg

|vo_08_04_friendship = 4

|vo_08_04_tx         = Razor doesn't know poems, but... Lupical likes them.
|vo_08_04_mention    = Venti

|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Bennett.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = Bennett... Much talking. Eat with him, never full.
|vo_08_05_mention    = Bennett

|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_quest      = The Meaning of Lupical
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = Klee, friend! Friend, but... big hassle.
|vo_08_06_mention    = Klee
|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Varka]]: Stranger
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka - Stranger.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = Varka? Razor doesn't know...
|vo_08_07_mention    = Varka
|vo_08_08_title      = About Varka: Memory
|vo_08_08_friendship = 6
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka - Memory.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = Oh, Varka is... a name. That man big. Big steelclaw, Razor's name &mdash; Varka gave him. Oh... want to see him.
|vo_08_08_mention    = Varka

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = *sniff* Hmm... You smell kind. Do you like meat?
|vo_09_02_title      = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = You are strong. Like a wolf. I like to hunt with you. We catch a lot.
|vo_09_03_title      = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = Lupical means wolf home&mdash; no, Lupical means wolf family. My Lupical lives in the woods. They say I am their Lupical.
|vo_09_04_title      = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = My Lupical is my only family. But I don't have four legs, not like them. Because I'm not a real wolf. Sometimes, this makes me sad.
|vo_09_05_title      = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = When I run with you, when I hunt with you, I am happy. With you, I am not a wolf, I am not a boy, I am just me. I am Razor. Because you are my friend. You are my Lupical. I hope you feel happy, too!

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = I like Lupical. I like the woods. I like my friend. I like to run!
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = Talking makes me tired. Talking is... hard. But... I have to try.
|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = I like meat, and... I like potatoes.
|vo_10_04_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = Greens are bad. Animal eats green things. Then I eat animal!

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->

|vo_11_01_file       = VO Razor Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Smells good, also tastes good, I like it.

|vo_11_02_title      = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO Razor Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = Eating this gives me energy, makes me happy.

|vo_11_03_title      = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO Razor Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = Eating it, bad. Not eating it, also bad. I'm a bit sad.

|vo_12_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = Today is your day. You were born on this day, many moons ago. I want to make you happy today. Can we eat meat together?

|vo_13_01_tx         = Arms... bigger!
